title: A man takes pictures in a woman's bathroom because of the new laws?
subtitle: A Pennsylvanian man was arrested for invading a women ' s bathroom, but he was not sexually transsexual or legally allowed to film there.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Because of new laws and policies that allow transgender people to use a bathroom matching their gender identity, a man from Pennsylvania infiltrated a women ' s bathroom and took pictures of a young girl.
